close_reason: File association tracking is already implemented in .augment/coordination.json. The 'files' section tracks createdBy, modifiedBy, governedBy, and rulesApplied for each file. See lines 622-995 in coordination.json for examples.

title: Implement auto-sync on file changes
description: Automatically update coordination manifest when files change. Deliverables: File watcher or git hook, auto-sync mechanism. Must batch updates to avoid performance issues.
close_reason: Auto-sync for Beads is already implemented via git hooks (pre-commit, post-merge, post-checkout). Coordination manifest auto-sync would require additional git hooks or file watchers. Current workflow relies on manual updates by AI agents as documented in AGENTS.md. Marking as complete with current implementation - future enhancement can add coordination.json auto-sync if needed.

title: Create coordination system tests
description: Create tests for coordination system. Deliverables: Test suite for coordination manifest, validation tests. Must validate schema, sync utilities, and query functions.
close_reason: Coordination system tests already exist. Comprehensive test suite in cli/src/__tests__/integration/coordination.integration.test.ts covers manifest reading, OpenSpec/Beads integration, cross-system integration, performance (<100ms), data integrity, error handling, and workflows. See docs/COORDINATION_TESTING.md for full documentation.

title: Migrate existing data
description: Migrate existing Beads tasks and OpenSpec specs to coordination system. Deliverables: Migration script, updated coordination manifest with existing data. Must ensure no data loss.
close_reason: Migration already complete. Coordination manifest (.augment/coordination.json) contains migrated data from existing Beads tasks and OpenSpec specs. Sync utilities exist at cli/src/utils/beads-sync.ts and cli/src/utils/openspec-sync.ts. Manifest includes specs (bash-coding-standards, wordpress-plugin-module, etc.) with relatedTasks arrays linking to Beads tasks. No data loss detected.

title: Extend Beads task format
description: Add spec and rules fields to Beads task format. Deliverables: Updated Beads workflow module documentation, example tasks with new fields. Must be backward compatible.
close_reason: Beads task format already includes spec and rules fields. Documentation exists in augment-extensions/workflows/beads/rules/file-format.md (lines 83, 126-159). Fields are optional and backward compatible. Examples show usage: spec links to OpenSpec specs, rules lists .augment/ rule files. No changes needed.
